Android.ShortDescription: Androids are Medium humanoids with the android subtype.

Human.ShortDescription: Humans are Medium humanoids and have the human subtype.

Kasatha.ShortDescription: Kasathas are Medium humanoids with the kasatha subtype.

Lashunta.ShortDescription: Lashuntas are Medium humanoids with the lashunta subtype.

Shirren.ShortDescription: Shirrens are Medium humanoids with the shirren subtype.

Vesk.ShortDescription: Vesk are Medium humanoids with the vesk subtype.

Ysoki.ShortDescription: Ysoki are Small humanoids with the ysoki subtype.

Dwarf.ShortDescription: Dwarves are Medium humanoids with the dwarf subtype.

Elf.ShortDescription: Elves are Medium humanoids with the elf subtype.

Gnome.ShortDescription: Gnomes are Small humanoids with the gnome subtype.

Half-Elf.ShortDescription: Half-elves are Medium humanoids with both the elf and human subtypes.

Halfling.ShortDescription: Halflings are Small humanoids with the halfling subtype.

Half-Orc.ShortDescription: Half-orcs are Medium humanoids with both the human and orc subtypes.

Aasimar*.ShortDescription: Planar scions are often Medium, and all are outsiders with the native subtype.

Alkainan.ShortDescription: Alkainans are Medium humanoids with the alkainan subtype.

Amrantah.ShortDescription: Amrantahs are Medium constructs with the magical and technological subtypes.

Anassanoi.ShortDescription: Anassanois are Medium humanoids with the anassanoi subtype.

Astrazoan.ShortDescription: Astrazoans are Medium aberrations with the shapechanger subtype.

Barathu (Early Stage)*.ShortDescription: Early stage barathus are Medium aberrations.

Bear (Uplifted)*.ShortDescription: Uplifted bears are Large magical beasts with a space of 10 feet and a reach of 5 feet.

Borai*.ShortDescription: Borais are Medium undead, but they do not gain normal undead immunities.

Brakim*.ShortDescription: Brakims are Medium humanoids with the brakim subtype.

Brenneri*.ShortDescription: Brenneris are Medium humanoids with the brenneri subtype.

Cephalume*.ShortDescription: Cephalumes are Medium aberrations with the plantlike subtype.

Copaxi.ShortDescription: Copaxis are Medium humanoids with the copaxi subtype.

Damai*.ShortDescription: Damais are Medium humanoids with the damai subtype.

Dessamar imago*.ShortDescription: Imagos are Medium humanoids with the dessamar subtype.

Dessamar instar*.ShortDescription: Instars are Small humanoids with the dessamar subtype.

Dirindi*.ShortDescription: Dirindi are Medium humanoids with the dirindi subtype.

Draelik.ShortDescription: Draeliks are Medium humanoids with the draelik subtype.

Dragonkin.ShortDescription: Dragonkin are Large dragons with a space and reach of 10 feet.

Drow*.ShortDescription: Drow are Medium humanoids with the elf subtype.

Elebrian.ShortDescription: Elebrians are Medium humanoids with the elebrian subtype.

Endiffian.ShortDescription: Endiffians are Medium humanoids with the endiffian and shapechanger subtypes.

Entu Symbiote.ShortDescription: Entu symbiotes are Small, Medium, or Large animals with the entu symbiote subtype.

Espraksa*.ShortDescription: Espraksas are Medium humanoids with the espraksa subtype.

Ferran.ShortDescription: Ferrans are Small humanoids with the ferran subtype.

Ganzi.ShortDescription: Ganzis are Medium outsiders with the native subtype.

Gathol.ShortDescription: Gathols are Medium humanoids with the gathol subtype.

Ghibrani.ShortDescription: Ghibranis are Medium humanoids with the ghibrani subtype.

Ghoran*.ShortDescription: Ghorans are plants. Sapling ghorans are Small plants, while oakling ghorans are Medium plants.

Gnoll*.ShortDescription: Gnolls are Humanoids with the gnoll subtype.

Goblin (Space).ShortDescription: Space goblins are Small humanoids with the goblinoid subtype.

Gosclaw.ShortDescription: Gosclaws are Medium humanoids with the gosclaw subtype.

Gray.ShortDescription: Grays are Small humanoids with the gray subtype.

Grippli*.ShortDescription: Gripplis are Small Humanoids with the grippli subtype

Haan.ShortDescription: Haans are Large monstrous humanoids with a space and reach of 10 feet.

Hadrogaan*.ShortDescription: Hadrogaans are Medium humanoids with the hadrogaan subtype.

Hobgoblin*.ShortDescription: Hobgoblins are Medium humanoids with the goblinoid subtype.

Ikeshti.ShortDescription: Ikeshtis are Small humanoids with the ikeshti subtype.

Ilthisarian.ShortDescription: Ilthisarians are Large monstrous humanoids with the ilthisarian subtype and space and reach of 10 feet.

Izalguun.ShortDescription: Izalguuns are Large monstrous humanoids with a space of 10 feet. Their reach depends on their posture (see below).

Kaa-leki.ShortDescription: Kaa-lekis are Medium humanoids with the kaa-leki and plantlike subtypes.

Kalo.ShortDescription: Kalos are Medium monstrous humanoids with the aquatic subtype, meaning they require water to breathe.

Kanabo.ShortDescription: Kanabo are Medium outsiders with the goblinoid and native subtypes.

Khizar*.ShortDescription: Khizars are Medium humanoids with the khizar and plantlike subtypes.

Kish.ShortDescription: Kish are Medium humanoids with the kish subtype.

Kitsune*.ShortDescription: Kitsune are Humanoids with the kitsune and shapechanger subtype.

Kobold*.ShortDescription: Kobolds are Small Humanoids with the Kobold subtype

Maraquoi.ShortDescription: Maraquoi are Medium humanoids with the maraquoi subtype.

Megalonyxa.ShortDescription: Megalonyxas are Large monstrous humanoids with a space and reach of 10 feet.

Morlamaw*.ShortDescription: Morlamaws are Large monstrous humanoids with the aquatic subtype. They have a space and reach of 10 feet.

Neskinti.ShortDescription: Neskintis are Medium humanoids with the neskinti subtype.

Orc*.ShortDescription: Orcs are Medium humanoids with the orc subtype.

Oread*.ShortDescription: Oreads are Medium outsiders with the native subtype.

Pahtra.ShortDescription: Pahtras are Medium humanoids with the pahtra subtype.

Phentomite*.ShortDescription: Phentomites are Medium humanoids with the phentomite subtype.

Prismeni.ShortDescription: Prismenis are Medium outsiders with the native subtype.

Reptoid.ShortDescription: Reptoids are Medium humanoids with the reptoid and shapechanger subtypes.

Ryphorian.ShortDescription: Ryphorians are Medium humanoids with the ryphorian subtype.

Samsaran.ShortDescription: Samsarans are Humanoids with the samsaran subtype.

Sarcesian.ShortDescription: Sarcesians are Large humanoids with the sarcesian subtype and a space and reach of 10 feet.

Screedreep*.ShortDescription: Screedreeps are Small humanoids with the screedreep subtype.

Selamid.ShortDescription: Selamids are Medium oozes with the selamid subtype, but they do not gain the normal ooze immunities.

Seprevoi.ShortDescription: Seprevois are Medium monstrous humanoids with the seprevoi subtype.

Shakalta.ShortDescription: Shakaltas are Medium humanoids with the shakalta subtype.

Shatori*.ShortDescription: Shatoris are Medium humanoids with the shatori subtype.

Shimreen*.ShortDescription: Shimreens are Medium humanoids with the shimreen subtype.

Shobhad.ShortDescription: Shobhads are Large monstrous humanoids with space and reach of 10 feet.

Skittermander.ShortDescription: Skittermanders are Small humanoids with the skittermander subtype.

Spathinae*.ShortDescription: Spathinae colonies are Medium monstrous humanoids.

Stellifera.ShortDescription: Stelliferas are Diminutive magical beasts with the aquatic subtype. A stellifera can’t breathe air unless he has artificial life support.

Strix*.ShortDescription: Strix are Medium humanoids with the strix subtype.

Suli*.ShortDescription: Sulis are Medium outsiders with the native subtype.

Svartalfar.ShortDescription: Svartalfars are Medium fey with the extraplanar subtype.

Sylph*.ShortDescription: Sylphs are Medium outsiders with the native subtype.

Trinir.ShortDescription: Trinirs are Small humanoids with the trinir subtype.

Tromlin Bloodseeker.ShortDescription: Tromlins are Medium humanoids with the tromlin subtype.

Tromlin Hardshell.ShortDescription: Tromlins are Medium humanoids with the tromlin subtype.

Trox*.ShortDescription: Trox are Large monstrous humanoids with a space and reach of 10 feet.

Tryziarka.ShortDescription: Tryziarkas are medium humanoids with the tryziarka subtype.

Undine*.ShortDescription: Undines are Medium outsiders with the native subtype.

Urog*.ShortDescription: Urogs are Large magical beasts with a space of 10 feet and a reach of 5 feet.

Varculak.ShortDescription: Varculaks are Small or Medium undead, depending on the species they once belonged to. Varculaks have a Constitution score, lack the unliving trait, and don’t gain undead immunities.

Varratana*.ShortDescription: Varratanas are Medium humanoids with the varratana subtype.

Verthani.ShortDescription: Verthani are Medium humanoids with the verthani subtype.

Vilderaro.ShortDescription: A vilderaro is a Medium monstrous humanoids with the aquatic subtype.

Vlaka.ShortDescription: Vlakas are Medium humanoids with the vlaka subtype.

Woioko.ShortDescription: Woiokos are Medium humanoids with the woioko subtype. Deepborn woiokos also gain the aquatic subtype.

Worlanisi.ShortDescription: Worlanisi are Small humanoids with the worlanisi subtype.

Wrikreechee*.ShortDescription: Wrikreechees are Medium monstrous humanoids with the aquatic subtype.
